website_summaries.verdict: This subtle highlighter palette is ideal for those looking for a more natural glow.
pros: Includes three different shades: a pink, champagne, and gold
Formulated with no parabens, talc, or fragrance
Creates a very natural, long-lasting sheen that is ideal for mature or textured skin
cons: Not ideal for those looking for a dramatic highlight

customer_reviews.title: Natural but Purposeful Glow
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I love how you really can't mess up, each of the colors has a very shimmery understated glow that is BUILDABLE. The shine also shows up in photos, and doesn't just make you look oily/sweaty. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Janli Gwo

customer_reviews.title: Good Subtle Glow
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed in how the picture makes the product look because the far right pan looks WAY more pink than what is actually in the product. But overall, I have liked using it. The product is very light weight and gives you a natural looking glow (which I really like because I am not a fan of overly glittery, chunky, or blinding highlights). I got this for about the same price as I would have gotten from Sephora but it was a bit cheaper and did arrive a lot quicker than it would have had I ordered from there

product_meta.title: Hourglass Ambient Lighting Palette. Three-Shade Palette with Finishing Powders for a Luminous Complexion. Vegan and Cruelty-Free.
product_meta.description: A limited-edition palette featuring three shades of Ambient Lighting Powder, the high-tech, soft-focus finishing powder that features state-of-the-art technology to recreate the most exquisitely flattering types of light. Create your perfect light. Ambient Lighting Powder is a groundbreaking collection of finishing powders that capture, diffuse, and soften the way light reflects on your skin. Unlike traditional powders, which merely cloak imperfections, Ambient Lighting Powder utilizes photoluminescent technology to filter out harsh light and refine the appearance of the complexion. The powders deliver a multidimensional luminescence to every skintone, making it appear softer and lit from within. The finishing powders enhance skin in any type of light, including flash photography. With three universal shades available in the Ambient palette, you can create your desired effect. It is formulated Without: - Parabens This palette includes one new limited-edition shade, Incandescent Light, and two existing shades, Dim Light and Radiant Light. It also comes with a complimentary 0.16 oz deluxe mini sample of Veil Mineral Primer. This product is free of talc, gluten, fragrance, and nanoparticles. ï¿½ I learned early on how different types of light can truly flatter the complexion. Growing up, my mother had pink light bulbs in all of the lamps throughout the house. She loved pink light because it was the softest and most flattering, and she always wanted to look good. I used this concept of lighting in Ambient Lighting Powder.ï¿½ Carisa Janes, Hourglass Founder
